task: Organiza un taller de baile de Bachata de un fin de semana

decomposition.intro: When organizing a weekend Bachata dance workshop, there are several distinct functional areas that need to be addressed to ensure the event's success. In this case, I have identified six major subtasks based on the key components involved in planning and executing a dance workshop. These areas cover different aspects such as logistics, marketing, instruction, coordination, and customer experience, which are essential for a comprehensive approach to organizing the event.

subtasks.description: This area is responsible for all the practical arrangements and resources needed for the workshop.
responsibilities: Secure a suitable venue for the workshop
Arrange transportation for instructors and participants if necessary
Coordinate accommodation options for out-of-town participants

subtasks.description: This area is responsible for promoting the workshop and attracting participants.
responsibilities: Develop a marketing strategy to reach the target audience
Create promotional materials such as flyers, social media posts, and online ads
Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of marketing campaigns

subtasks.description: This area is responsible for planning and delivering the dance classes and workshops.
responsibilities: Design the workshop schedule and curriculum
Ensure a structured and engaging learning experience for participants

subtasks.description: This area is responsible for overseeing the overall coordination of the workshop.
responsibilities: Create a detailed timeline of activities for the weekend
Coordinate with instructors, staff, and volunteers
Address any unexpected issues or changes during the event

subtasks.description: This area is responsible for ensuring a positive and enjoyable experience for participants.
responsibilities: Provide clear communication regarding workshop details and expectations
Offer assistance and support to participants throughout the event
Gather feedback and testimonials to improve future workshops

subtasks.description: This area is responsible for managing the budget and financial aspects of the workshop.
responsibilities: Create a budget that covers expenses such as venue rental, instructor fees, and marketing costs
Track income from participant registrations and ticket sales
Ensure financial transparency and accountability throughout the event

Logistics.original: Find and book a spacious venue that is suitable for dance workshops, with adequate flooring and mirrors.
Organize transportation for instructors and participants, including airport transfers if needed.
Research and provide accommodation options for out-of-town participants, ensuring a range of choices to fit different budgets and preferences.

Marketing.original: Conduct market research to identify the target audience for the Bachata dance workshop.
Design and implement a multi-channel marketing strategy to promote the workshop.
Create engaging promotional materials including flyers, social media posts, and online ads.
Set up tracking mechanisms to monitor the performance of marketing campaigns.
Analyze the data collected to evaluate the effectiveness of the marketing efforts.
Make adjustments to the marketing strategy based on the analysis to optimize results.

refined.original: Analyze the current marketing strategy results.
Identify areas for improvement based on the analysis.
Develop a revised marketing strategy incorporating the identified adjustments.

Instruction.original: Develop a detailed workshop schedule outlining class timings, breaks, and activities.
Create a comprehensive curriculum that covers basic to advanced Bachata dance techniques.
Recruit skilled and experienced Bachata instructors to lead the workshops.
Coordinate with instructors to ensure they are aligned with the curriculum and schedule.
Implement interactive teaching methods to keep participants engaged and motivated.
Provide feedback mechanisms to assess participant progress and adjust teaching strategies accordingly.

Coordination.original: Develop a comprehensive schedule outlining the specific activities and timings for each day of the weekend workshop.
Communicate effectively with the instructors, staff, and volunteers to ensure everyone is clear on their roles, responsibilities, and schedules.
Establish a protocol for handling any unforeseen circumstances or last-minute changes that may arise during the event.

Customer Experience.original: Create a detailed information package including workshop schedule, location, dress code, and what to bring.
Design a system for participants to easily reach out for help or guidance during the event.
Develop a post-event survey to collect feedback on the workshop experience.

Finances.original: Develop a detailed budget outlining expenses for venue rental, instructor fees, marketing costs, and miscellaneous expenses.

refined.original: Identify specific venue options and associated rental costs.
Research potential venues for the workshop
Obtain rental cost quotations for each venue
Determine instructor fees based on hourly rates and total expected hours.
Allocate budget for different marketing strategies and associated costs.
Break down miscellaneous expenses into categories for better tracking.

Finances.original: Set up a system to track and record income from participant registrations and ticket sales accurately.
Establish financial controls to ensure transparency and accountability in all financial transactions during the event.
